title: I can't seem to get into the game
body: hi! i just got the game and was excited to play it, i hit the play button then hit tutorial but when i did my computer said "input singal out of range" i had to hit esc to get out of the screen and tryed to join again but the same thing happened, i tried to play the game with out the tutorial and again the same thing happened. No matter what i did i got the same screen when i tried to join the cilent, is there anything i can do? is it my computer thats the problem? when i joined the match it said i could get a penalty for being afk, so i can't try again either or else i will get a penalty.

replies.body:
Most of the time that out of range message is happening because the resolution isn't matching between your desktop and the game. Double check your client options and make sure it's set to run at the same resolution that your pc is set to and that should work!

If that doesn't help, we can try resetting those config settings back to default by following these steps.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

hi again! thank you for helping but sadly it didn't work, when i made the resolution the same as my pc it didn't work and had the same problem, when i tried deleting the config folder it still didn't work. is there anything else i can try? or is my computer not compatable with league of legends?

Hmmmm I'm sure it's not that you're pc isn't compatible. Let's get you in touch with our tech agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can dig a little deeper with you to get this figured out!
